name: TSB-Lab-Site
description: Website for the ideation and prototyping lab

scripts.publish: git checkout master && git add . && git commit -a -m "build" && git push && git merge --strategy=ours gh-pages -m "build" && git add . && git commit -a -m "after-build" && git push && git checkout pages && git pull --allow-unrelated-histories && git merge master && git filter-branch --prune-empty --subdirectory-filter docs gh-pages && git add . && git commit -a -m "build" && git push

author: Sebastian Meier @seb_meier
